title: Intro to Programming
description: Master coding basics in 4 hours. Build a strong foundation for programming with this comprehensive introduction.

title: Web Dev Bootcamp
description: Immerse in web development essentials. Cover HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in this 8-hour intensive bootcamp.

title: Data Science Essentials
description: Unlock data insights in 6 hours. Learn analysis, visualization, and machine learning fundamentals.

title: Graphic Design Fundamentals
description: Explore visual design in 5 hours. Master graphic design principles using Adobe Creative Suite tools.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Create mobile apps in 10 hours. Learn design, development, and deployment for iOS and Android.

title: Digital Marketing Mastery
description: Master digital marketing in 4 hours. Learn SEO, social media, and content creation strategies.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Boost cybersecurity skills in 8 hours. Understand threats, hacking techniques, and implement robust security measures.

title: Financial Planning & Budgeting
description: Learn finance basics in 6 hours. Master budgeting, investments, and plan for a secure financial future.

title: Photography Basics
description: Master photography essentials in 3 hours. Explore camera settings and composition for captivating images.

title: AI Fundamentals
description: Explore AI basics in 6 hours. Understand machine learning and neural networks for practical applications.

title: Video Editing Techniques
description: Learn video editing in 5 hours. Master software tools for creating professional-quality videos.

title: Business Analytics
description: Harness data for decisions in 6 hours. Learn statistical analysis and forecasting for informed decision-making.
